description_for_model: PortalPay is a crypto payment gateway. Use the API to create QR-code receipts, list transactions, and fetch site settings. Helps businesses accept payments with 0.5-1% fees and no monthly cost.
description_for_human: Accept crypto and card payments via QR codes with 0.5-1% fees. Create receipts, monitor transactions, and configure branding.

endpoints.name: Create Receipt
endpoints.description: Create an itemized receipt used to generate a QR-code payment portal.

endpoints.name: List Transactions
endpoints.description: Query transaction logs for analytics and auditing.

endpoints.name: Get Site Settings
endpoints.description: Fetch site configuration including branding and token defaults.
